§oMake Steam great again!§r

The §2Industrial Steam Engine§r is a multiblock added by §2Gregicality Multiblocks§f and has an it's structure gotten reworked a bit in this pack. It allows you to create ALOT of energý early from §2Steam§r with the corresponding dynamo hatch. Be sure to watch out for the Steam usage though! A §2LV 16A Dynamo hatch§r already needs 10KL Steam, which are 2 100% running Large Bronze Boilers.

§9Note§r: In this pack, 4A and 16A LV/MV dynamo hatches were added specifically for this multiblock.
